itunes:title: Episode 469 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/27/19 - Live From Orlando!
title: Episode 469 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/27/19 - Live From Orlando!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Tactical Brewery in Orlando covering the Florida/Miami game, discussing Andrew Luck retiring, why women can't be kickers in the NFL, covering all this weekend's college football spreads, and live drafting fan...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Tactical Brewery in Orlando covering the Florida/Miami game, discussing Andrew Luck retiring, why women can't be kickers in the NFL, covering all this weekend's college football spreads, and live drafting fantasy football teams for the Drinkin' Bros Underdogs League and Danthony's Champions League Fantasy League.  It might be the longest show we've ever done.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are live from Tactical Brewery in Orlando covering the Florida/Miami game, discussing Andrew Luck retiring, why women can't be kickers in the NFL, covering all this weekend's college football spreads, and live drafting fantasy football teams for the Drinkin' Bros Underdogs League and Danthony's Champions League Fantasy League.  It might be the longest show we've ever done.
